page.title: 11MRS LISTER'S AFTERNOON
page.content: 11.45,lunch which was sandwiches, Alice had baby food, gave dogs their lunch. Saw to Oscar's wound, phone rang, Aunt was rushed to hospital collected greens swept fold yard.Took washing in swept up dog hair. Put Alice for a sleep.Posted letters, visited a friend in Leven for coffee & a chat, collected the children from school. Took children riding & played with Alice.Looked at some wardrobes.Went home & fed Alice, had tea which was fish & chips,did washing, changed Alice for bed & put her to bed.Friends arrived,milked goats,a man brought the boiler.Put Mr.Lister's tea in oven. Ate tea,did bottles. Children went to bed.Did ironing made coffee & made the other bottles.11.3Opm put ironing away,read for 15 mins,put cats to bed, then THANKFULLY I went to bed.
